hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team gets "The Belt of Victory" PLUS a season pass to Six Flags Magic Mountain. Good for up to 7 members of the team.
Award for the team PLUS two unity Pro licenses. The team will decide who gets them.
Award for the team PLUS one FREE vive headset.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=6616 Lexington Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90038, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does the idea or project show creative thinking? Does it stand out from the crowd? Is your idea unique and original? Are there similar mechanics, game play or experiences already out there?
Does this "WOW" the player? Does it make the player want to come back and experience it again? Does the player want to share (and tell) their friends about it?
How does the experience relate to the category it is applied in? Does it capture the essence of that category?

hackathon-location-address: 6616 Lexington Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90038, USA
hackathon-description-header: Creating VR experiences for Halloween to both entertain and terrify
